name: merge(with:_:_:_:_:_:)
desc: Combines elements from this publisher with those from six other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
declaration: func merge<B, C, D, E, F, G>(with b: B, _ c: C, _ d: D, _ e: E, _ f: F, _ g: G) -> Publishers.Merge7<Self, B, C, D, E, F, G> where B : Publisher, C : Publisher, D : Publisher, E : Publisher, F : Publisher, G : Publisher, Self.Failure == B.Failure, Self.Output == B.Output, B.Failure == C.Failure, B.Output == C.Output, C.Failure == D.Failure, C.Output == D.Output, D.Failure == E.Failure, D.Output == E.Output, E.Failure == F.Failure, E.Output == F.Output, F.Failure == G.Failure, F.Output == G.Output
